Comment: AOC and Bernie are leaning heavily into this kind of high-intensity election messaging, and honestly, it’s beginning to feel off-putting. The tone and urgency of their campaigning seem out of step with the chaotic political landscape we’re actually in.   With the way things are spiraling, it’s hard to even be confident we’ll make it to the midterms as we know them.   The Republican base seems more radicalized than ever, and at this point, even if we managed to keep free elections, I’m not convinced it would be enough to steer the country back toward stability.
Author: NegotiationExtra8240
